archimate:Folder.name: 7.5.1.3 LSSTCam Era Phase 1 ITC
archimate:Folder.documentation: This ITC supports the Phase I goals of : 1) Achiving LSST Cam Data to the Raw data partition of the Base Data Backbone via the Observator Operations service. 2) Sending data to the Peer distibutors at NCSA (where it is forwared to teh processed) via the bandwith-protexed channel on the north south network. 3) Return of information to the OCS system via the OCS Gatway.
